duck: Charitable trust - A charitable trust is an irrevocable trust established for charitable purposes, and is a more specific term than "charitable organization".
Affinity group - An affinity group is a group formed around a shared interest or common goal, to which individuals formally or informally belong.
Collective - A collective is a group of entities that share or are motivated by at least one common issue or interest, or work together on a specific project(s) to achieve a common objective.
Bureaucracy - A Bureaucracy is "a body of nonelective government officials" and/or "an administrative policy-making group."
Coalition - A coalition is a pact or treaty among individuals or groups, during which they cooperate in joint action, each in their own self-interest, joining forces together for a common cause.
organization definition: the act or process of organizing or of being organized.
An organization is a social entity  that has a collective goal and is linked to an external environment.
Business organization - Companies law (or the law of business associations) is the field of law concerning companies and other business organizations.
